description: This ex satanist is describing how they performed their rituals where they drank the blood of humans. Listen very closely because this is one of the reasons there are so many disappearances around the country today. Especially with homeless people. At the end he’s talking about a model and actress from the 1960’s named “Sharon Tate”. He was explaining that she wanted to get out and the Illuminati has her killed by Charles Manson. #hollyweirdisevil #ImReaching #HollyweirdIsEvilFellOff
